description: The Shaikshanik Chatravriti Yojana, implemented by the Backward Classes and Minorities Welfare Department of Madhya Pradesh, provides scholarships to students from Other Backward Classes (OBC) to pursue higher education. The scheme aims to support meritorious OBC students by covering educational expenses, thereby promoting access to quality education.
key_features: Scholarships for OBC students pursuing higher education
Covers tuition fees and other educational expenses
Implemented through the state education department
Aims to reduce dropout rates among OBC students

benefits.scholarship_amount: Varies based on course and institution
benefits.coverage: Tuition fees, maintenance allowance, and other academic expenses

education_criteria: Students enrolled in recognized higher education courses (graduate/postgraduate)
Courses must be approved by UGC, AICTE, or equivalent
additional_criteria: Applicant must belong to Other Backward Classes (OBC) as per Madhya Pradesh government norms
Annual family income must not exceed Rs. 3 Lakhs
Must be a resident of Madhya Pradesh
eligibility.admission_requirement: Admission to recognized institutions through merit or entrance tests
institution_criteria: Government or recognized private institutions in India

eligible_courses_delhi: Graduate and postgraduate courses in arts, science, commerce, engineering, medical, etc.
Professional courses like B.Tech, MBBS, MBA, etc.
Other courses approved by regulatory bodies

steps: Visit the official Madhya Pradesh scholarship portal
Register with personal and academic details
Fill out the scholarship application form
Upload required documents and submit the application
Track application status through the portal
application_process.note: Ensure timely submission as per academic year deadlines

required_documents.note: To prove family income below Rs. 3 Lakhs

special_notes: Scholarship amount varies depending on the course and institution
Renewal requires submission of academic progress reports
Applicable only for students studying in recognized institutions
